pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Improved saving, pop-up flow, and palette buttons

content.html:
@spaepcke can probably answer this better than me. I would say that:

  • Buildings made in a previous session are treated like any other model inserted in the scene before opening the editor (since we don't support editing an existing building yet)

  • I think for now we're just leaving the other models there where they were, even if they're on the way... On the Model Editor we're thinking of greying them out, so it is clear they are not part of whatever is being edited.
